p: In the above-proposed reaction pathways, the oxidation reaction from Mn(BTC) to MnO 2 plays an important role in this system. On the one hand, MnO 2 is capable of delivering a high capacity, but on the other hand, MnO 2 generally suffers from rapid capacity fading due to the dissolution of manganese from the MnO 2 electrode [ 15]. Therefore, the poor cycling stability of the Mn(BTC)//ZnSO 4//Zn system as discussed in Fig.Â S4 is considered to be mainly caused by the dissolution of MnO 2.
